about_the_game:
Allows you to change academy BGM to 'Let’s Go, Jump!'.

* Songs will be available after the completion of the story dungeon, 'A Maze-like Garden', and can be changed from the Home Menu's BGM Settings, under Status.
detailed_description:
Allows you to change academy BGM to 'Let’s Go, Jump!'.

* Songs will be available after the completion of the story dungeon, 'A Maze-like Garden', and can be changed from the Home Menu's BGM Settings, under Status.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G1820
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 280/Radeon HD 7750
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750　1GB

short_description: Allows you to change academy BGM to 'Let’s Go, Jump!'.
